channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large deep pothole, 7th January
item.description:
On blackstock road southbound, a large and dangerous pothole. Please fix. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackstock Road, Stoke Newington, Greater London

item.title: Office chair blocking pavement, 7th January
item.description:
Looks like an office chair has been dumped on the pavement outside MS Society. It is blocking the pavement on a well used thoroughfare. Itâ€™s been there for at least 3 days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Freelands Grove, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: The cracks go end to end on start of the bridge, 7th January
item.description:
The start of the bridge ramp there are cracks that go from one end of pavement to the other end. Everytime there is a bus or lorry going over that crack/ hole there is a big jump and theres a lot of vibration going to all the houses near by. It is very bad for the road and near by houses

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking sign knocked and at an angle, 7th January
item.description:
Just by the rear of the veterinary surgery and alleyway running behind the shops on Kingsdale Road, a street parking sign has been knocked out of place and is at an angle across the pavement. It has been like this for nearly a week. Coupled with nearby flytipping, the path is partially blocked and could cause an injury.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping of chairs, old canopy, danger next to sub station, 7th January
item.description:
Chairs and items flytipped / stored in a public area next to the electricity sub station. A canopy is in disrepair. Danger of injury, flying debris and fire. Since summer 2025.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forest Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large wooden door and wooden planks fly tippes, 7th January
item.description:
There are still large pieces of wood that have not been collected. These are balanced against a wall. They are dangerously big and could injury someone if they fall. Need to be removed

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Braydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Fridge Freezer dumped on the street, 7th January
item.description:
Fridge Freezer unit was dumped on the street by the people at the the school on Margaret road (we saw them do this and have photos). They regularly dump school waste and furniture here. There's also a chair and some bits of wood further up the road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Margaret Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Skip has been in place for over 10 months, 7th January
item.description:
This skip was put on the estate to take away small metal fencing after it was replaced. This job happened around 10 months ago, the skip has remained and is attracting fly tipping. It is blocking access for fire and ambulance. Please remove thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwood Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees and furniture dumped on pavement, 7th January
item.description:
A number of trees and chairs have been dumped on the street and pavement on dunn street. As this is outside an electricity depot this is a safety concern.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunn Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
